text:
Do we have any Farsi speakers that could double-check the display quality of the R start-up message here?

<https://github.com/r-devel/r-project-sprint-2023/issues/76#issuecomment-1699417504>

attachments.text:
Here is the startup message when we start R with `LANGUAGE=fa`

<https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7606389/264396748-976449db-172d-42c1-a8dd-eb84e20802c6.png|Screenshot 2023-08-30 4 37 24 PM>

<https://github.com/alswajiab|@alswajiab> and <https://github.com/imanalhasani|@imanalhasani> vetted that it looks ~roughly OK (though they don't speak Farsi, Arabic is similar). Note that this is mixing RtL and LtR as well.

(also note that I am running this on Linux)
attachments.title: Comment on #76 Explore support for Right-To-Left languages in R console
